title: Probably the worst film of all time
review: At last, a horror flick for TOTAL wimps.  Pathetic to say the least and hyped beyond all compare.Highpoints?  I was at a cinema seeing a different film and people came out mid-way to demand a refund.Rock.  I saw it on a video and it's 86 minutes of my life I'll NEVER get back.Life is too short for crap movies.
